data.name: The Cellar
data.detailed_description:
In this horror game, the stringer searches for information on the case of the mysterious disappearance of five children in 1997. An investigation leads him to an abandoned primary school, from which all five disappeared. He finds data about a certain cellar, which some children called "the cellar of Mr Bear". Who is this Mr. Bear and what happened to the missing children? This is what you have to find out ...

Game Features:
Environmental storytelling
The environment of an abandoned primary school hides many secrets

Realistic graphics
Modern graphics technology

VHS style
The exact tv style of the late 90s

Each walkthrough is unique
Random generation of the location of objects and some events in the game

data.short_description: In this game, the stringer searches for information on the case of the mysterious disappearance of five children in 1997. An investigation leads him to an abandoned primary school, from which all five disappeared. He finds data about a certain cellar, which some children called "the cellar of Mr Bear".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
